page.title: 01AREA PROFILE.
page.content: Our D block is situated about 40 km East of London,in Kent on the North Downs.It is a rural area the majority of it being farmland. The largest village in the block is Wrotham which is situated in the south westerly corner.It has a population of approximately 2000.The only other complete village is Fairseat which is much smaller.Parts of other villages are included.These are Trottiscliffe (pronounced Trosley) Vigo and Stansted.Vigo is a new village which is just 19 years old and takes its name from the nearby Vigo inn.The M.20 motorway runs through the block just North of Wrotham. To the east is part of Trosley Country Park.
